      • validate

        public boolean validate(java.lang.String _time)
        This method validates the time from a given string If time matches the regex expression, it will return a true.

        Usage: validate("10:00"); > true validate("Friday"); > false validate("24:10"); > false validate("00:10"); > true

        This method returns a double value of the duration between two time
